title: Executive Order 7712-Amending the Tariff of United States Consular Fees
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 1745 of the Revised Statutes, as amended (U.S.C., title 22, sec. 127), it is ordered that the Tariff of United States Consular Fees be, and it is hereby, amended as follows:
Immediately following paragraph nine of Item 8 of the Tariff of United States Consular Fees, the following paragraph is prescribed:
"The taking of an application for, and issuance of, a travel certificate for use in China, $1.00."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7712-Amending the Tariff of United States Consular Fees Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/369011
